body.p: The publication of an Exposure Draft or issuing of an IFRS Accounting Standard (including an IAS® Standard or an IFRIC® Interpretation of the Interpretations Committee) shall require approval by eight members of the IASB if it comprises 13 members or fewer, or by nine members if it comprises 14 members. Other decisions of the IASB, including the publication of a Discussion Paper, shall require a simple majority of the members of the IASB present at a meeting that is attended by at least 60 per cent of the members of the IASB, in person or by telecommunications.
